comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Princess_Louise-Marie_of_Belgium Louise-Marie (18 February 1858 in Brussels – 1 March 1924 in Wiesbaden), princess of Belgium, was the eldest daughter of Leopold II, king of the Belgians, and his wife Marie Henriette, archduchess of Austria. [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/3820613030/]

comment._content: Excellent photography of great Lady. Thanks and regards.
